HomePage.title: Documents That Understand You!
HomePage.subtitle: Chat with your documents and unlock their hidden insights. Our secure, AI-powered search transforms complex information into natural conversations, letting you explore your private data through simple questions. Get precise answers, discover connections, and make your documents work smarter for you.

Metadata.title: Welcome to Documinds
Metadata.description: A Chat-Based Private Document Search with RAG

deleteAlert.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteAlert.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the collection "{name}" and all its documents.

collectionDetails.title: Collection Details
collectionDetails.description: View and manage your collection information. The settings section allows you to update collection metadata properties.

name.min: Collection name must be at least {min} characters
name.max: Collection name must be less than {max} characters
name.format: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed

value.max: Value must be less than {max} characters

createCollection.dialogDescription: Create a new collection to organize your documents. Provide a unique name and optional attributes to categorize your content effectively.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Add a description for the collection...

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.description: Your session has expired. Please login again to continue.

Common.selectCollection: Please select a collection from the sidebar
